body_html:
Looks reasonable. I'd say numpy's API on this one is kinda bad. The 1D=>2D and 2D=>1D operations shouldn't have the same name. But people are already used to it.

But this way is inconsistent with mm and bmm, and other things..

But this way is inconsistent with mm and bmm, and other things..
body:
Looks reasonable. I'd say numpy's API on this one is kinda bad. The 1D=>2D and 2D=>1D operations shouldn't have the same name. But people are already used to it.

But this way is inconsistent with `mm` and `bmm`, and other things..
